questionTitle: The policeman ordered <u><font color='red'>the suspect</font></u> <u><font color='red'>to don't remove</font></u> <u><font color='red'>his hands</font></u> <u><font color='red'>from the</font></u> hood of the car.
It was <u><font color='red'>him</font></u> <u><font color='red'>who</font></u> came running <u><font color='red'>into the classroom</font></u> <u><font color='red'>with the news</font></u>.

<u><font color='red'>My brother</font></u> doesn't care how much <u><font color='red'>does the car cost</font></u> <u><font color='red'>because</font></u> <u><font color='red'>he is going to buy</font></u> it anyway.
<u><font color='red'>Mary and her</font></u> sister <u><font color='red'>studied</font></u> biology <u><font color='red'>last year</font></u>, and <u><font color='red'>so does Jean</font></u>.
Peter had <u><font color='red'>already saw</font></u> that musical <u><font color='red'>before</font></u> he <u><font color='red'>read</font></u> the reviews <u><font color='red'>about it</font></u>.
